Uses of Class
tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop

  • Packages that use MenuHost.Pop 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of MenuHost.Pop in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return MenuHost.Pop 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MenuHost.Pop MenuHost.activePop() 
      MenuHost.Pop MenuHost.Pop.inElement(Element<?> elem)
      Optionally confines the menu area to the given element.
      MenuHost.Pop MenuHost.Pop.inScreenArea(pythagoras.f.IRectangle area)
      Optionally confines the menu area to the given screen area.
      MenuHost.Pop MenuHost.Pop.relayEvents(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Causes the menu to handle further events on the given layer.
      MenuHost.Pop MenuHost.Pop.retainMenu()
      Flags this Pop event so that the menu will not be destroyed automatically when it is deactivated.
      Methods in tripleplay.ui with parameters of type MenuHost.Pop 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MenuHost.popup(MenuHost.Pop pop)
      Displays the menu specified by the given pop, incorporating all the configured attributes therein.
